successes.title: Esington Glass: The Ultimate Productivity Timer
successes.description: Resolve to be a better, more productive you with the Esington Glass.

Pledges.description:
MINI TRIO.  THREE (3) MINI timers.  The MINI is half the height of the large and is a 3 minute timer.  Perfect for games, timing breaks or just a cool piece of art.  One of each color: Steel, Gold and Copper!
* Add $30 to any other pledge and automatically get the MINI TRIO! *

SUPER EARLY BIRD STANDARD 25 MINUTE TIMER.  The most productive thing you'll ever put on your desk!  Start your new year determined to be 10 times more productive.  Retail will be $80.  FREE USA SHIPPING!
